topic.name: Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular)
topic.sub_subject_name: Physical Sciences (Matter, Energy, and the Laws of the Created World)
topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Biology: The Study of Life (Cellular and Molecular) in Science & Nature

objectives.sub_subject_name: Life Sciences (Living Systems Designed with Purpose & Order)

objectives.objective_text: Identify that we grow because our cells split.
